basics.name: Abdul Moiz
basics.headline: Aspiring Software Engineer | Web, AI/ML & Automation Focused

summary: Full-stack developer and AI specialist building sleek, scalable digital systems. Experienced in NestJS, Next.js, MongoDB, Python, and AI/ML pipelines. Skilled in turning complex ideas into production-ready solutions, with a passion for experimentation and innovation.

experience.title: IT Team Member
experience.description: A dedicated IT team member at RAS Society, ensuring seamless technology solutions and support for all event.

experience.title: Co-founder
experience.description: As a co-founder of Zero Limit Apparel, I contributed to the brand's strategic direction, website and product development,marketing, and overall growth

experience.title: Private Tutor
experience.description: Tutored a university student in core CS subjects like Distributed Computing, OS, and DSA—focused on concepts, assignments, projects, and boosting performance with hands-on examples.

experience.title: AI Intern
experience.description: Developed TaskWise, an AI-powered project management app with RAG, automated task division, team-lead selection, AI-driven reports, and sentiment analysis.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Worked on scalable software engineering projects applying AI and core CS concepts. Hands-on experience with JavaScript, LLMs, frontend, and backend development.

projects.title: Tasks by AION
projects.description: AI-Powered Automation Platform
projects.fullDescription: Aion Tasks is an AI-powered automation platform built to streamline documentation, research, and productivity workflows. The system allows users to upload document templates and dynamically generate content using AI, create on-brand AI-generated slide decks, intelligently expand spreadsheets with pattern detection, and run advanced research that delivers instant insights via webhooks. It integrates multiple AI engines to deliver faster, smarter task execution with a focus on automation at scale.

projects.title: Zero Limit Apparel
projects.description: E-Commerce Platform
projects.fullDescription: Zero Limit Apparel is an e-commerce platform project I developed, which involves building a seamless online shopping experience. The website is deployed using Next.js and MongoDB, providing users with an intuitive interface for browsing and purchasing products. Since deployment, the site has attracted over 1,500 visitors, demonstrating its functionality and reach

projects.title: Personal Assistant
projects.description: Your Ultimate Discord Personal Assistant – Automate Tasks, Manage Finances, and Boost Productivity
projects.fullDescription: A smart Discord-based assistant designed to streamline productivity and daily management. It automates email handling, tracks income and expenses, and generates monthly income statements. The assistant also sends daily LeetCode challenges to keep coding skills sharp and provides task reminders for events, deadlines, and birthdays.

projects.title: Fear Insight
projects.description: Premium Streetwear Apparel Brand
projects.fullDescription: Fear Insight is a faith‑driven streetwear brand, offering premium quality clothing that blends fashion with spiritual inspiration and bold self‑expression. The platform allows users to browse and shop a curated collection of apparel. Built with Next.js and backed by modern web tech, the store emphasises quality fabrics, meaningful brand messaging, and a seamless shopping experience.

projects.title: Predator-Prey Simulation
projects.description: Parallel Computing Project
projects.fullDescription: Built an interactive, parallelized ecosystem simulation using Python (backend) and TypeScript (frontend). Integrated real-time visualization, PDF report generation with dynamic graphs, and AI-powered summary using Gemini API.

projects.title: Insightify
projects.description: AI-powered GitHub activity analytics and insights platform
projects.fullDescription: An intelligent automated tracking system that monitors your GitHub coding activity daily and provides comprehensive analytics. It automatically fetches commits, calculates coding hours, tracks languages used, and generates AI-powered insights using Google Gemini. The platform delivers beautiful daily progress notifications via Discord and monthly comprehensive reports via email with auto-generated charts. Built with Python and GitHub Actions for complete automation, it helps developers understand their productivity patterns and maintain coding streaks.

projects.title: Github-Agent
projects.description: AI Agents that generate and push readme files for my repos
projects.fullDescription: An intelligent AI-powered agent designed to analyze GitHub repositories and streamline project management. It automatically detects the tech stack and core functionality of any project, generates a detailed README.md file, and publishes it on GitHub. The agent simplifies documentation, ensures consistency across projects, and saves developers significant time.

projects.title: LeetCode Solutions
projects.description: Solution of all my leetcode attempted questions
projects.fullDescription: LeetCode Solutions is a curated collection of my attempted problems on LeetCode, showcasing efficient solutions in Java, JavaScript, and Python.

projects.title: GPTWrapped
projects.description: ChatGPT Year in Review
projects.fullDescription: GPT Wrapped is a Next.js application that analyzes your ChatGPT conversation history and generates a beautiful, shareable 'Wrapped' experience—similar to Spotify Wrapped. Upload your ChatGPT export and discover personalized insights including your usage personality type (Code Wizard, Creative Mind, Data Detective, etc.), longest usage streak, most active times and days, conversation depth, top discussion topics, and much more. The app features a beautiful gradient interface with swipeable slides, comprehensive analytics, and the ability to download and share your Wrapped as an image. Built for ChatGPT users who want to visualize and celebrate their AI journey throughout the year.

projects.title: Docgent
projects.description: Smart document generator for assignments, reports, and invoices
projects.fullDescription: Docgent is an AI-powered document generation assistant built to create professional Word documents like assignments, reports, and invoices.

projects.title: NoteMind
projects.description: RAG-powered intelligent note assistant
projects.fullDescription: NoteMind is a smart note assistant built using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

projects.title: Updates Bot
projects.description: AI-Powered Discord Update Automation
projects.fullDescription: Updates Bot is a Discord automation tool I built to streamline daily internship updates. Instead of manually formatting messages, you can drop your raw update and the bot leverages Gemini AI to craft a perfectly formatted post. Additionally, it stores your GitHub access token securely and automatically reads your daily git commit messages at 7 AM, sending them as updates to the designated Discord channel. Currently deployed on Vercel, the bot is built for efficiency, automation, and stress-free daily reporting.

projects.title: Twiiter Clone
projects.description: DSA Semester Project implementing various data structures
projects.fullDescription: User IDs via linked list, tweets via queue, notifications via stack, file handling for persistence.

projects.fullDescription: Integrated food ordering with rider pickup to dine-in experience.

projects.fullDescription: Generate and send context-aware emails via Gmail using ChatGPT.

projects.fullDescription: Dashboards, summaries, invoice gen, and goals with dark/light modes.

projects.title: Broken Bone Detection
projects.description: ML-based X-ray bone fracture classification system
projects.fullDescription: Deep learning on labeled X-rays with metrics.

projects.title: PDF Quiz App
projects.description: Ask MCQs from your own PDFs and get instant answers
projects.fullDescription: Frontend in Next.js, backend in Python using document QA.

projects.fullDescription: CGPA/GPA tools with progress bars and responsive UI.

projects.fullDescription: Relational backend with BI features.
